column5: There is no such thing as a tiller fan...... let the games begin CONSOLE  Art
Bite your tongue southern man.    	Brook loved the openness of the bad ass tiller.
Nice rig. Not the best for when them flying carp are doing their thing. Man overboard!!!
Aaron weibe has been running a 250 for a few years on a warrior. Not my cup of tea but if I was fishing anything but a bass boat I’d be in a tiller
Interesting.  Reckon you need a big-ass boat just to keep your stern from going under with the weight of that!
